biography: Parsa Pirouzfar is a painter, actor of theater and cinema who was born in 1972 in Anzali, Iran. After completing his education, his first time in front of the camera was for "Statue" by Ebrahim Vahid. After that, he was featured in Dariush Mehrjuei's "Pary" and "Feast" by Masoud Kimiaei. Among his other activities in the cinema Dariush Mehrjuei's "Mom's Guest", "Azizollah Hamid Nejad's" The Tear of the Cold ", "Horse is a Decent Animal" by Abdolreza Kahani, "The Unwanted Woman" by Tahmineh Milani can be named.
name: Parsa Pirouzfar
